description: This file contains security-related utility functions for password hashing, JWT token creation, and verification, as well as internal cryptographic operations.

methods.name: str _pbkdf2_sha256(password: str, salt: bytes, iterations: int = 260000)
methods.description: Derives a PBKDF2-SHA256 hash for a password and salt.

methods.name: str hash_password(password: str)
methods.description: Hashes a password with a randomly generated salt.

methods.name: bool verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str)
methods.description: Verifies a plain password against a stored hash.

methods.name: str _b64url(data: bytes)
methods.description: Encodes bytes into a URL-safe base64 string without padding.

methods.name: bytes _b64url_decode(data: str)
methods.description: Decodes a URL-safe base64 string back into bytes.

methods.name: str _jwt_sign(header: Dict[str, Any], payload: Dict[str, Any], secret: str)
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT token using header, payload, and secret.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] _jwt_verify(token: str, secret: str)
methods.description: Verifies a JWT token and returns payload if valid, otherwise None.

methods.name: str create_access_token(subject: str, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None)
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT access token with expiration.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] decode_token(token: str)
methods.description: Decodes and verifies a JWT token.

ctags.name: _jwt_sign
ctags.pattern: /^def _jwt_sign(header: Dict[str, Any], payload: Dict[str, Any], secret: str) -> str:$/
ctags.signature: (header: Dict[str, Any], payload: Dict[str, Any], secret: str)

ctags.name: _pbkdf2_sha256
ctags.pattern: /^def _pbkdf2_sha256(password: str, salt: bytes, iterations: int = 260000) -> str:$/

ctags.name: create_access_token
ctags.pattern: /^def create_access_token(subject: str, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None) -> str:$/
